amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities now printed in the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Economic and Educational.

Economic and Educational amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Modifications made in order pursuant to the provisions of sec. 3 of H. Res. 440, adding a new section to the bill and providing for the incorporation of the bill's text into H.R. 3448, and conforming the title of H.R. 3448.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 440, the the Economic and Educational amendment (A001) as modified was considered to have been adopted.
